title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.001
frontText: Data that is stored in JSON format can be described as what type of data?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.002
frontText: True or False: Stream processing is the only logical component of a real‐time data processing solution.
backText: False. In addition to stream processing, real‐time data processing solutions include real‐time message ingestion engines, an analytical data store, and reporting.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.003
frontText: A __________________ is a data store that provides the single source of truth for different functional areas within a business.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.004
frontText: What are the four Vs of big data?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.005
frontText: Which data manipulation pattern requires the transformation and storage components to be in the same engine?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.006
frontText: True or False: One of the core principles of data solutions that use a Lambda architecture is that raw data is immutable, meaning that it is never overwritten.
backText: True. Data remains immutable in a Lambda architecture, taking advantage of scalable cloud storage solutions such as Azure Blob Storage to store data in several stages.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.007
frontText: What is Azure’s MPP data warehouse service?
backText: Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pools

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.008
frontText: What service on Azure is a fully managed Spark service that provides a workspace for Spark development and has first‐party integration with Azure services such as Azure Active Directory?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.009
frontText: The Azure Cosmos DB Cassandra API is an example of what kind of NoSQL data store?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.010
frontText: What are the no‐code data transformation components in Azure Data Factory?
backText: Mapping data flows and Power Query

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.011
frontText: ______________ are used to ensure the orderly processing of tasks in a data pipeline.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.012
frontText: ______________________ analytics involves using historical data to build statistical and machine learning models to forecast what will happen in the future.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.013
frontText: ______________________ analytics combine several artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques such as deep learning and natural language processing to draw inferences from existing data and patterns.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.014
frontText: Which chart type represent how a series of values change over time?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.015
frontText: Which chart type show the relationship between two numerical values?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.016
frontText: What type of data visualization tool give analysts the ability to organize data into informational summaries to monitor how different areas of the organization are performing?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.017
frontText: What scalable file system is Azure Data Lake Store Gen2 based on?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.018
frontText: ______________________ provides a no‐code solution for citizen developers to perform data transformations in Azure Data Factory.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.019
frontText: ______________________ properties ensure data integrity in transactional databases.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.020
frontText: What is the default isolation level for SQL Server and Azure SQL Database?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.021
frontText: Which type of data normalization involves eliminating repeating groups in individual tables, creating separate tables for each set of related data, identifying each set of related data with a primary key, relating tables with a foreign key, and eliminating fields in tables that do not depend on the foreign key?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.022
frontText: Higher forms of data normalization such as 3NF are typically used for which type of relational database workload?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.023
frontText: What is a common design pattern for data warehouses and OLAP models that classify tables as dimension and fact tables?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.024
frontText: True or False: Local temporary tables are visible to any user after they are created and are deleted when all user sessions referencing the table are disconnected.
backText: False. Local temporary tables are only visible to the user session they are created in and are dropped when the session is disconnected.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.025
frontText: What type of relational database structure provides a virtual layer over multiple tables to allow users to easily query the data they need without needing to continuously write complex queries with multiple join and aggregation operations?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.026
frontText: True or False: Clustered indexes physically sort and store data based on their values.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.027
frontText: What type of database objects consist of T‐SQL code that will run in response to a specific event such as a DDL, DML, or login action?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.028
frontText: What are the three categories of cloud services that can be deployed in Azure?
backText: Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), Software as a Service (SaaS)

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.029
frontText: Which Azure SQL offering falls under the IaaS category of cloud services?
backText: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.030
frontText: True or False: Each Azure SQL offering includes hybrid licensing benefits that allow organizations to apply on‐premises SQL Server licenses to reduce the cost of the service.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.031
frontText: What VM category is the Microsoft recommended choice for SQL Server on Azure VMs?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.032
frontText: Which PaaS database offering on Azure provides near 100% feature compatibility with SQL Server?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.033
frontText: What are the two service tiers available for Azure SQL MI?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.034
frontText: True or False: The subnet hosting an instance of Azure SQL MI can host other Azure services.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.035
frontText: Which Azure SQL Database deployment option represents a collection of databases with a shared set of resources, such as CPU or memory?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.036
frontText: Which Azure SQL Database purchasing model provides the most resource options by allowing users to choose the number of vCores, the amount of memory, and storage speed?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.037
frontText: __________________ allow specific IP address or a range of IP addresses to access either the logical server hosting one or more Azure SQL Databases or a single Azure SQL Database.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.038
frontText: How often does Azure create full, differential, and transaction log backups for Azure SQL Databases?
backText: Full backups are taken once a week, differential backups are taken every 12–24 hours, and transaction log backups are taken every 5–10 minutes.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.039
frontText: What are the three distribution patterns that can be used to design Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pool tables?
backText: Hash distribution, round‐robin distribution, and replicated tables

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.040
frontText: What scripting tools can be used to manage the deployment of different Azure services?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.041
frontText: __________________ templates are JSON files that define the resources and configuration requirements for a deployment to Azure. This is an example of Infrastructure as Code.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.042
frontText: What Azure service can be used to manage the migration of an on‐premises SQL Server database to an Azure SQL Database?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.043
frontText: What methods are used to enforce data security for relational databases in Azure?
backText: Network isolation, access management, data encryption and obfuscation, and security management

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.044
frontText: __________________ statements are used to define database objects.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.045
frontText: Which SQL constraint sets a value for a column if a value is not specified when a new row is inserted?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.046
frontText: What are the Unicode data types that are used to define string data?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.047
frontText: What are the different categories of NoSQL databases?
backText: Key‐value store, document database, columnar database, and graph database

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.048
frontText: What NoSQL data store is typically used for analytical workloads and are not well‐suited for transactional ones?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.049
frontText: How many APIs can be configured for a single Azure Cosmos DB account?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.050
frontText: What is the native API to Azure Cosmos DB?
backText: The Azure Cosmos DB Core (SQL) API

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.051
frontText: How many RUs does it cost to read a 1 KB item?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.052
frontText: __________________ is a key‐value store that can be created in an Azure Storage Account.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.053
frontText: What are the five consistency levels offered in Azure Cosmos DB?
backText: Strong, bounded staleness, session, consistent prefix, and eventual

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.054
frontText: What format does the Azure Cosmos DB Core (SQL) API use to store data?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.055
frontText: What security mechanism is created to grant native Azure Cosmos DB users limited time access to Azure Cosmos DB resources?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.056
frontText: What are the two bounded limits that can be configured to set the staleness window for Azure Cosmos DB accounts using the Bounded staleness consistency level?
backText: Maximum lag time and the maximum lag operations

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.057
frontText: Containers can be configured to use _________________ throughput.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.058
frontText: Azure Cosmos DB maintains ____ replicas of data in each region.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.059
frontText: What is the unit of management for a set of Azure Cosmos DB containers?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.060
frontText: Which Azure Cosmos DB API can be used to create a columnar database?
backText: The Azure Cosmos DB Cassandra API

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.061
frontText: What is the minimum number of RU/s that can be allocated to a new Azure Cosmos DB container that has 20 GB of data?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.062
frontText: What type of storage is optimized to store large volumes of binary data, such as images, videos, and audio files?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.063
frontText: What is the highest level of management for Azure Storage?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.064
frontText: True or False: Azure Files can be accessed via SMB and NFS protocols with the standard and premium performance tiers.
backText: False. NFS for Azure Files is only available with the premium performance tier.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.065
frontText: Which Azure Storage redundancy option creates three copies across three different availability zones in the same region?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.066
frontText: The ______ access tier for Azure Files uses standard HDDs for storage and is optimized for transaction heavy workloads.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.067
frontText: What service creates a local cache of an Azure file share on a local file server?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.068
frontText: What blob type is optimized for storing OS and data disks for VMs and databases?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.069
frontText: When enabled, which feature enables Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 for Azure Blob storage?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.070
frontText: A ___________ is an access management method that delegates permissions to specific storage account resources over a predetermined period.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.071
frontText: When assigned, the ____________ Azure RBAC role will allow Azure AD identities to read, write, and delete data in Azure file shares over SMB.
backText: Storage File Data SMB Share Contributor

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.072
frontText: What permissions need to be assigned to an Azure AD identity to read specific data blobs when using access control lists (ACLs) for ADLS access management?
backText: Read permissions on data and execute permissions on the directories that host the data.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.073
frontText: __________ is an Azure Storage feature that protects data from being accidentally deleted. When this feature is enabled, data can be recovered within a specified retention period.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.074
frontText: What Azure service can be used to move data from on‐premises and cloud data stores to Azure Storage as a part of an ETL pipeline?
backText: Azure Data Factory (ADF) and Azure Synapse Analytics Synapse pipelines

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.075
frontText: Administrators can isolate PaaS resources like Azure storage accounts by attaching a private IP address from an Azure VNet with a ________.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.076
frontText: What resources can be managed in Azure Storage Explorer?
backText: Any Azure Storage resource, including storage accounts, blob containers, ADLS directories, file shares, and data.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.077
frontText: What data processing technique is used to process large volumes of data at periods of time or after a specified event?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.078
frontText: Data warehouse tables that store large volumes of quantifiable observations are referred to as ________.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.079
frontText: Azure HDInsight, Azure Synapse Analytics, and ________ can be used to deploy Spark clusters for data engineering and data science activities.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.080
frontText: What open‐source service that can be deployed as an Azure HDInsight cluster can be used as a distributed real‐time message broker?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.081
frontText: What component in the Spark architecture is responsible for dividing data processing activities into smaller tasks and distributing them to compute nodes?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.082
frontText: What development languages can be used to build data processing workflows with Azure Databricks?
backText: Java, Scala, Python, R, and SQL

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.083
frontText: ________ is a distributed file system that is mounted into an Azure Databricks workspace.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.084
frontText: True or False: The control plane includes all services that are managed by a user’s Azure subscription.
backText: False. The control plane includes all services that are managed by the Azure Databricks cloud and not the cloud subscription of the organization that deployed the Azure Databricks workspace.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.085
frontText: How is the processing cost of an Azure Databricks cluster measured?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.086
frontText: When configuring a new Azure Databricks workspace, what feature allows you to associate any clusters created in the workspace with one of your Azure virtual networks?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.087
frontText: What Azure Databricks cluster mode is optimized to run interactive workloads?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.088
frontText: What PaaS offering can be used to develop code‐free data processing pipelines?
backText: Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Analytics Synapse pipelines

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.089
frontText: Azure Data Factory ________ activities include Azure Databricks notebooks, mapping data flows, and Azure HDInsight Hive queries.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.090
frontText: Linked services define the connection information that is needed for Azure Data Factory to connect to external resources. What are the two types of linked services that Azure Data Factory supports?
backText: Data stores, such as Azure SQL Database and Azure Blob Storage, and compute resources, such as Azure Databricks and Azure HDInsight

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.091
frontText: Integration runtimes provide the compute infrastructure where activities either run or get triggered from. What are the three types of integration runtimes that Azure Data Factory supports?
backText: Azure, self‐hosted, and Azure‐SSIS integration runtimes

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.092
frontText: True or False: Azure Synapse Analytics serverless SQL pools allow developers and analysts to interactively query data stored in Azure Storage. A serverless SQL pool does not have local storage or ingestion capabilities.
backText: True. Serverless SQL pools are built‐in to every Azure Synapse Analytics workspace, appropriately named “Built‐in.”

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.093
frontText: ________ is a data virtualization technology that enables SQL Server databases and Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pools to query Azure Storage data while allowing the data to stay in its original location and format.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.094
frontText: What three T‐SQL commands are used to define external tables when using PolyBase?
backText: CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE, CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT, and CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.095
frontText: What T‐SQL command is used to access Azure Storage data with an Azure Synapse Analytics serverless SQL pool?

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.096
frontText: ________ are virtual tables created from a SELECT statement that precompute, store, and maintain data in a dedicated SQL pool just like a normal table.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.097
frontText: True or False: Interactive reports can only be created and modified with Power BI Desktop.
backText: False. While it is a best practice to use Power BI Desktop to create and modify interactive reports, report creators can quickly create new or modify existing reports in the Power BI service.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.098
frontText: There are two desktop applications that can be used to create Power BI reports. Of these applications, ________ is used to build interactive reports, while ________ is used to build paginated reports.
backText: Power BI Desktop; Power BI Report Builder

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.099
frontText: What are the three connection types that can be used in Power BI Desktop to establish a connection to a data source?
backText: Import, DirectQuery, and live connection (only for connections to SQL Server Analysis Services and Azure Analysis Services)

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.100
frontText: What outside elements can be added (pinned) to a Power BI dashboard?
backText: Report visuals, entire interactive reports, Power BI Q&A visuals, Power BI Quick Insights visuals, Excel workbook objects, tiles from another dashboard, and on‐premises paginated reports from Power BI Report Server or SSRS.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.101
frontText: What are the different stand‐alone tile types that can be added to a Power BI dashboard?
backText: Web content, text boxes, images, videos, and streaming data.

title: fc855835.AzDaFuSG.102
frontText: In addition to a wizard to get you started with a blank report, what three Power BI Report Builder wizards guide you through establishing a connection to a data source, creating a dataset, and building a report?
backText: Table or Matrix Wizard, Chart Wizard, and Map Wizard
